text: Dag C. Weberg (born 14 September 1937 in Hole) is a Norwegian politician for the Conservative Party. He was elected to the Norwegian Parliament from Oppland in 1989, and was re-elected on one occasion. He had previously served in the position of deputy representative during the terms 1977-1981, 1981-1985 and 1985-1989\. Weberg was a member of Jevnaker municipality council from 1975 to 1983. From 1983 to 1989 he was a member of Oppland county council. ==References== * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Conservative Party (Norway) politicians Category:Members of the Storting Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Dag C. Weberg
